name: CoinBoy
description:
As a boy with a special superpower  - mastering the movement of the coin, is he able to find his way through all the challenge?
Grab your Keyboard and Gamepad and make a try!

Gameplay Instructions
WASD/Gamepad Left Analog: move around
Space/Gamepad Face Right: jump or use coin to multi-jump / step on enemy's head to knock them out
Left Mouse Click/ Left Trigger: Shoot the coin forward to slow the enemy
Right Mouse Click /Right Trigger: Shoot the coin backward to use the recoil to move in the air

This is the game for the 2019 Spring UE4 Game Jam.

Enjoy~~!
